output.name: Protobuf Color Example
output.description: An example C++ project demonstrating how to generate and use Protocol Buffers code for a simple Color message using CMake, Protobuf, and Abseil.
featureList: Example of generating C++ code from .proto files
Static linking of Protocol Buffers and Abseil libraries
CMake build integration for external projects

author.name: Petras Vestartas
author.contributionSummary: Developed example code and CMake build scripts.

entity.title: Laser Scanning with Industrial Robot Arm for Raw-wood Fabrication
entity.abstract: This paper presents an integrated raw-wood fabrication workflow using an industrial robot arm and a laser scanner. The research is situated in a Swiss mountain forestry context where timber in its natural form could be applied locally without relying on large centralized timber industries.

academicCatalogRelations.justification: Listed under publications by Petras Vestartas via get_author_publications_tool.

entity.abstract: Currently, the Swiss timber industry in mountain areas largely exports unprocessed lumber and imports finished timber products due to the lack of digital tools. entity.title: Joinery Solver for Whole Timber Structures
entity.abstract: This paper presents a digital joinery generation method for whole-timber structures using wood-wood connections.
